Detailed Description

Class Key describes a key object using the ASCII code, Scancode and modifier bits.

Definition at line 16 of file key.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Key::Key (  )  [inline]

Default constructor seting ASCII, scancode and modifier of the key to 0. That way an invalid keycode is generated.

Definition at line 40 of file key.h.

Member Function Documentation

void Key::invalidate (  )  [inline]

Sets the key to an invalid keycode by reseting the scancode (default = 0).

Definition at line 52 of file key.h.

bool Key::valid (  )  [inline]

Tests if the current key is valid.

return TRUE if scancode does not equals 0 otherwise FALSE is returned.
